subject: Add stubs for missing/changed functions in the plugin interface
commitMessage:
Add stubs for missing/changed functions in the plugin interface

This fixes system_server startup, as it crashes if the devman plugin
does not implement the full interface.

Change-Id: I4582040ec96e6af18d9012822c39e2d5b3483921

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

rpmlint checked packaging/device-manager-plugin-pinetrail.spec: 2 errors, 1 warnings.
- W: non-standard-group TO_BE/FILLED_IN
- line 41: E: hardcoded-library-path in %{buildroot}/usr/lib/libslp_devman_plugin.so.%{version}
- line 42: E: hardcoded-library-path in %{buildroot}/usr/lib/libslp_devman_plugin.so

Patch Set 1:

The tag submit/trunk/20121019.214627 pushed, but the commit d970d96ed077a56f9f0d3d4e37cf3dcda5b4a1e1 is still under review in gerrit. After reviewer accpet this commit, it will be submitted to OBS corresponding project.
